title: VideoSecu 24" Long Arm TV Wall Mount Low Profile Full Motion Cantilever Swing & Tilt wall bracket for most 22" to 55" LED LCD TV Monitor Flat Panel Screen VESA 200x200 400x400 up to 600x400mm - Articulating Arm Extend up to 24" MAH
description: The VideoSecu TV mount is a mounting solution for most 22"-47" LCD LED Plasma TV and some LED up to 55". It fits VESA 600x400mm (24"x16"), 400x400mm (16"x16"), 400x200mm (16"x8"),300x300mm (12"x12"),200x200mm (8"x8"),200x100mm (8"x4") mounting hole pattern on the back of your TV. Heavy gauge steel construction provides safety loading up to 66lbs display. The two-link arm design provides up to 180 degrees of swivel, 15 degrees tilt up or down, and 24" extension, make it easier for get perfect viewing angle. The removable VESA plate can be taken off for easy installation. Post-installation level adjustment allows the TV to perfectly level. The on arm cable management ring system design, guides wires and prevent cable pinching. Standard hardware and user manual included. Note: From Nov 27, 600x400 adapters are provided with this product.
